text: Achterwetering is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Utrecht. It is a part of the municipality of De Bilt, and lies about 4 km northwest of Bilthoven. The statistical area "Achterwetering", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 90.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Populated places in Utrecht (province) Category:De Bilt
title: Achterwetering
